title: Ep62: Somme Success - Air War 1916
itunes:title: Ep62: Somme Success - Air War 1916
itunes:subtitle: Peter and Gary continue their series about the air war during WWI, by exploring the desperate fighting that took place in the skies over the Somme in 1916. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more...
description:
Peter and Gary continue their series about the air war during WWI, by exploring the desperate fighting that took place in the skies over the Somme in 1916.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
